caption.p: Management of STEMI in COVID-19 confirmed/suspected patients. ACEi angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor, BP blood pressure, CPR cardiopulmonary resuscitation, DBP diastolic blood pressure, GI gastrointestinal, GU genitourinary, H/O history of, HR heart rate, ICH intracranial hemorrhage, LA left arm, PCI percutaneous coronary intervention, RA right arm, SBP systolic blood pressure, STEMI ST-elevation myocardial infarction. *High risk individuals: 1. HR > 100/min and SBP < 100 mm of Hg, 2. pulmonary edema, 3. signs of shock, 4. CPR required. **Medical therapy: 1. antiplatelet, 2. anticoagulation, 3. high intensity statin, 4. beta blocker/ACEi
